2.details: Create app_constants.dart and all missing entity models (User, Tutor, Course, Session, Message, etc.) with proper JSON serialization.

3.details: Create ApiClient base class and all specific API clients (AuthApiClient, UserApiClient, TutorApiClient, etc.) with proper HTTP handling.

4.details: Create repository interfaces and implementations following Clean Architecture pattern for all entities.

5.details: Implement all business logic use cases and application services for authentication, user management, tutoring, etc.

6.details: Create all Riverpod/Provider state management classes for managing app state across the application.

7.details: Create all missing page widgets (SplashPage, LoginPage, HomePage, DashboardPage, etc.) with proper routing.

8.details: Resolve all import path errors, fix ambiguous imports, and ensure proper module dependencies.

9.details: Run flutter analyze, flutter doctor, and test app compilation to ensure all errors are resolved.
